explains: adj. 重要的；宝贵的；贵重的；经估价的

sentences.en: Parenting is not fully valued by society.
sentences.cn: 养育子女还没有得到社会的充分重视。

sentences.en: Individuality is a valued and inherent part of the British character.
sentences.cn: 个性是英国人重视并固有的特征。

sentences.en: Aristotle was valued because of his clear exposition of rational thought.
sentences.cn: 亚里士多德因其对理性思维的清晰阐述而被重视。
